hero_subtitle: 300+ five-star reviews. 24/7 emergency callouts. Fair prices, no surprises — just reliable electrical work across the West Midlands.

custom_about.heading: Why Choose MJB?
custom_about.text:
MJB Electrical Services is a trusted, local electrician based in Halesowen — proudly serving homeowners and businesses across the West Midlands for years. As a hands-on, one-man operation, you'll always know exactly who's turning up at your door. Every job gets the same care and attention, whether it's replacing a single switch or rewiring an entire house.

With over 300 five-star reviews, the reputation speaks for itself: clear communication, fair pricing, tidy work, and no hidden surprises. MJB specialises in fault finding and rectification — the tricky jobs other electricians can't solve. Available 24/7 for emergencies, because electrical problems don't wait for Monday morning.

steps.title: Get in Touch
steps.desc: Call or message us with your electrical issue. We'll have a chat, understand what you need, and give you an honest quote — no obligation.

steps.title: We'll Book You In
steps.desc: We work around your schedule. You'll get a confirmed time slot and we'll keep you updated if anything changes — no waiting around all day.

steps.title: Job Done Right
steps.desc: We arrive on time, explain what we're doing at every step, and leave your home spotless. All work tested and certified.

steps.title: Peace of Mind
steps.desc: Every job comes with a satisfaction guarantee. If something's not right, we come back and fix it — that's our promise.

custom_faq.a: Yes — we're available 24/7 for electrical emergencies across Halesowen, Birmingham, Dudley, and the wider West Midlands. Call us anytime on 07941 746878.

custom_faq.q: How much does a consumer unit upgrade cost?
custom_faq.a: Prices vary depending on the size of your property and existing wiring, but we always provide a clear, fixed quote before starting any work. No hidden fees or surprise charges.
Absolutely. We're Checkatrade approved and fully insured. All work meets current BS 7671 wiring regulations and comes with the appropriate certification.

custom_faq.q: Can you help with fault finding?
custom_faq.a: It's one of our specialities. If you've got a tripping breaker, flickering lights, or a problem other electricians couldn't solve — give us a call. We have specialist equipment and years of experience tracking down faults.
Of course. Whether it's a single socket, a light fitting, or a full rewire — every job gets the same care and attention. No job too small.
We're based in Halesowen and cover the wider West Midlands including Birmingham, Dudley, Stourbridge, Oldbury, Solihull, Smethwick, and more. If you're not sure, just ask.
